title: 重要通知：因0403地震，K書中心AB兩館即日起皆暫停開放。Important Notice: Due to the earthquake on April 3rd, both Building A and Building B of K Book Center will be temporarily closed until further notice.
author: 游守正
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 游守正 - cecil@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6594
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 重要通知：因0403地震，K書中心AB兩館即日起皆暫停開放。Important Notice: Due to the earthquake on April 3rd, both Building A and Building B of K Book Center will be temporarily closed until further notice.
日期： Tue, 9 Apr 2024 16:17:11 +0800

親愛的教職員生：
(1).因本次0403大地震，K書中心A館部分區域受損與積水，K書中心B館內側自習區天花板冷氣風管脫落與輕鋼架受損，皆需關閉進行修復與清理；因餘震持續不斷，將視實際情況，再行公告開放時間。

(2).有急需到K中B館拿取書籍物品者，將統一於4/10(三)早上10：00~11：00，洽現場工讀生確認身份拿取；A館統一於4/10(三)下午14：00~15：00，洽現場工讀生確認身份拿取。

教學卓越中心 敬啟

Dear faculty and students,

Due to the earthquake on April 3rd, some areas of Building A in K Book Center have been damaged and flooded, while the ceiling air ducts and light steel frames in the inner study area of Building B have detached and sustained damage, necessitating closure for repair and cleanup. Given the ongoing aftershocks, the reopening hours will be announced based on the actual situation.

For those urgently needing to retrieve books or items from Building B, the collection will be conducted uniformly on April 10th (Wednesday) from 10:00 to 11:00 AM. Please approach the on-site student workers for identity verification and retrieval. As for Building A, the collection will be conducted uniformly on April 10th (Wednesday) from 2:00 to 3:00 PM. Please approach the on-site student workers for identity verification and retrieval.

Best regards,
Center of Teaching Excellence
